Summary •	Versatile hands-on experience in software development with focus on requirements gathering, product/release/sprint/team planning and estimation, design, technical/training documentation, architecting, development, Unit/System/User Acceptance testing and retrospective with strong knowledge of project management techniques including waterfall, RAD, and AGILE methodology (Scrum). 
•	Proficient in developing websites and web applications using Backbone, Bootstrap, Node.js, PHP, MySQL, HTML 4.01/5, XHTML 1.0, DHTML, XML, CSS, Java Script, JQuery, AJAX. 
•	Good Understating of networking protocols(DNS, TCP/IP,SSH, HTTP/S).  
•	Experience in web and mobile testing using emulators, mobile devices and browser like safari, chrome, Firefox, IE 9. 
•	Having exposure to work with big enterprise organization as well as small startups. 
•	3 year of experience in website development using different frameworks of PHP like Wordpress, Zend frame work and Magento. 
•	Have worked in LAMP environment. Worked with Ubantu server / Linux command line. Also comfortable with modifying htaccess and Apache con files. 
•	Strong knowledge in using Object Oriented Programming concepts as well as full working knowledge of DOM. Also, proficient in increasing efficiency of web pages. 
•	Experience in Relational MySQL database design and maintainace. 
•	Involved in Responsive web development.  
•	Expertise in using Subversion as Version Control tool and also used TFS and GIT for some projects. 
•	Used Amazon S3, Amazon Simple DB, Google Analytics, Google Maps, Facebook, etc. 
•	Experience of using REST and SOAP web services and consumption their XML and JSON result set in javascript.. 
•	Experience in creating documentation of technical systems, training users in complex topics, and operational procedures. •	We are working on AGILE methodology for this project.

Project : MDMS(Marketing Distribution and Management System Complete management of Product is done via this system. From Order's Placement to Order's Dispatch cycle is maintained via this system. 
Order Passes through different phases like: Requested, Payment Received, Allocated to Designer, In Design, Allocated to Auditor, In Audit, Ready For Print, PO Generated, In Print , Material Inward, Print Received, Ready for Packing, Dispatched, Delivered. In this complete cycle requester, designer, auditor, Printer Agency, Courier Agency, Packers comes into picture. All their data is managed by this system. Many different kind of reports are provide like Profit and Loss Report, Request Status Report, Printer Cost Report, News letter report, Stock Report. 
 
Roles and Responsibilities: 
•	I was dedicated developer for this project Major Modules were implemented by me in this project. And worked on majory all the modules of the project. And developed new many modules like stock report, Order Management System, Item master, Category master, Item mapping. 
•	I started the project as developer and became lead of the project. 
•	Was involved in preparing technical documents. 
•	Was involved in communicating with clients for some modules. 
•	Worked with very bulky database in MySQL. Created tables, stored procedures, triggers and complex queries. 
•	Had worked with testing team for testing of all the modules.
